ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
ygData.msgSnippet: That s actually a good suggestion, Alazzar.  It s a technique I use with my Wizard every time he levels.  I haven t done it as much with my Necro, because he
ygData.messageBody:
That's actually a good suggestion, Alazzar. It's a technique I use with my
Wizard every time he levels. I haven't done it as much with my Necro,
because he actually has a much higher intelligence than my Wizard, hehe. So
his skills raise VERY quickly....it actually scares me sometimes :)

Mujahid

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Peck White [mailto:pwhite@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 9:14 AM
> To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
>
>
> From: Peck White <pwhite@...>
>
> Although I'm a newbie here, I do have a quick suggestion.
> Whenever I level
> I always spend about 10 - 15 minutes maxxing my stats before hunting if
> possible. To do this I cast a pet and target it, then cast Disease Cloud
> (10 mana Conjuration) and Siphon Strength (5 mana Alteration) at it until
> both are maxxed. That way I know I'll do as well as possible for my level
> in battle.
>
> Hope this helps and isn't redundant information.
>
> Alazzar
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 9:57 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
>
>
> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>
> Ok. Thanks for the info.
>
> I was wondering because it seems that as I gain level (within a circle of
> spells), toward the end of that circle I cast a higher level pet
> more often
> than a lower level pet.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Barry Senowitz [mailto:barrys@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 8:28 AM
> > To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
> > Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
> >
> >
> > From: Barry Senowitz <barrys@...>
> >
> > skill only effects the chances of a successful cast
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 9:07 AM
> > To: EQ_Necromancers
> > Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
> >
> >
> > From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
> >
> > Is the level of pet you summon related in any way to your
> > conjuration skill?
> > Or does your conjuration skill only determine your chances of a
> successful
> > cast?
> >
> > Thanks
> > Mujahid 23 Necro Solusek Ro
